      • addAction

        @NonNull
public JavaActionProvider.Builder addAction(@NonNull
                                                     JavaActionProvider.Action action)

      • createProjectOperation

        @NonNull
public JavaActionProvider.Action createProjectOperation(String command)

      • createSimpleScriptAction

        @NonNull
public JavaActionProvider.ScriptAction createSimpleScriptAction(@NonNull
                                                                         String command,
                                                                         boolean requiresValidJavaPlatform,
                                                                         boolean javaModelSensitive,
                                                                         boolean scanSensitive,
                                                                         boolean enabledInCoS,
                                                                         @NonNull
                                                                         String... targets)
        Creates a simple JavaActionProvider.ScriptAction for given command performing given targets. The action just calls the given targets in project's build file. The action does not support Compile On Save.
        Parameters:
        command - the action command
        requiresValidJavaPlatform - if true the action is not executed when the project has invalid platform
        javaModelSensitive - if true the action requires java model
        scanSensitive - if true the action needs to wait for scan finish
        enabledInCoS - if true the action is enabled in compile on save mode
        targets - the targets to execute
        Returns:
        the newly created JavaActionProvider.ScriptAction
        Since:
        1.109

      • createSimpleScriptAction

        @NonNull
public JavaActionProvider.ScriptAction createSimpleScriptAction(@NonNull
                                                                         String command,
                                                                         boolean requiresValidJavaPlatform,
                                                                         boolean javaModelSensitive,
                                                                         boolean scanSensitive,
                                                                         boolean enabledInCoS,
                                                                         @NonNull
                                                                         java.util.function.Predicate<JavaActionProvider.Context> enabled,
                                                                         @NonNull
                                                                         java.util.function.Supplier<? extends String[]> targets)
        Creates a simple JavaActionProvider.ScriptAction for given command performing given targets. The action just calls the given targets in project's build file. The action does not support Compile On Save.
        Parameters:
        command - the action command
        requiresValidJavaPlatform - if true the action is not executed when the project has invalid platform
        javaModelSensitive - if true the action requires java model
        scanSensitive - if true the action needs to wait for scan finish
        enabledInCoS - if true the action is enabled in compile on save mode
        enabled - the Predicate to enable the action
        targets - the Supplier of targets to execute
        Returns:
        the newly created JavaActionProvider.ScriptAction
        Since:
        1.109
